title: New: Alex Winston – Choice Notes (J£ZUS MILLION Remix)
content:
Mr.

Chameleon himself, (Joseph Zucco), abandoned the much beloved Teenage Reverb at the tail end of last year to replace him with the now equally hyped J£ZUS MILLION. The records that followed the gear change were cleaner, more hip focused and all together more distinctive in their execution. Take his early drop, Benefits, half chillwave, half freak-hop, it was a jumbled and multi faceted take on hip-hop.

If this new remix is anything to go by, it’s clear that we’re not the only ones impressed by Mr. Zucco. His remix of Alex Winston’s Choice Notes is perhaps a more conservative effort, regardless, it’s smooth, effortless and gives the original a much needed kick into life.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
